titleStmt.title: SII 7.776: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 776. (A.R. No. 152 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻ cūḻnta puṇari Akaḻ cūḻn=ta puviyiṟ ponne
miyaḷavuṉ taṉnemi naṭappa viḷaṅku jayamakaḷai yiḷaṅkopparuvattuc cak
karakoṭṭat=tu vikkiramattoḻilāṟ putumaṇam puṇarntu matuvaraiyīṭṭam vayirākarattu vari
yil tuṉaik kontaḷavaracar tan taḷamiriya vāḷuṟai kaḻittut toḷvali kāṭṭip poṟpari naṭāttik
kirttiyai niṟutti vaṭaticai vākai cūṭit teṉṟicait temarukamalap pūmakaḷ potumaiyum poṉniyā
ṭai naṉnilappāvaiyun taṉimaiyun tavirntu punitaṟ ṟirumaṇimakuṭam muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭi
t taṉnaṭi yiraṇṭun taṭamuṭiyākat toṉnilaventar cūṭa muṉṉai maṉuvāṟu perukak kaliyā
ṟu vaṟuppac ceṅkol ticaitoṟuñ cella veṇkuṭai Irunilavaḷākam veṅ
kaṇu n=taṉātu tirunikaḻ veṇṇilā t=tikaḻa Orutani meruviṟ puli viḷaiyāṭa
pārkaṭal tivān=tarat=tup pūpālar tiṟai viṭutan=ta kalañcori kaḷuṟu muṟaimuṟai niṟpa
vilaṅkiya teṉnavaṉ karun=talai parun=talaittiṭat tan poṉnakar puṟattiṭaik kiṭappa
viṉnāṭ piṟkulappiṟaipol ṉiṟpiḻaiyeṉṉuñ colletir ko
ṭā veḻkulattaracarai yaḷattiyiliṭṭiṟ ṟiṉat=tiṭṭam pariyum viṭṭa taṉ māṉamuṅ kūṟiya viramuṅ ki
ṭappa Eṟiya malaikaḷum mutuku neḷippa viḻin=ta natikaḷuñ cuḻaṉṟuṭaintoṭa viḻun=ta kaṭalu n=talaivirittala
mara k=kuṭaticait taṉṉāḷukan=ta tāṉun tāṉaiyum paṉnāḷiṭṭa palapala mutukum payantetir marṟiya jayappe
runtiruvum paḻiyukantu koṭutta pukaḻuñ celviyum vāḷāroṇkaṇ maṭantaiya riṭ
ṭamum miḷātu koṭutta veṅkari niraiyuṅ kaṅkamaṇṭalamuñ ciṅkaṇameṉṉum
pāṇiyiraṇṭum Oruvicaik kaikkoṇ ṭiṇṭiya pukaḻoṭu pāṇṭimaṇṭalamu
ṅ koḷḷat tiruvuḷattaṭaittu veḷḷavaru parittaḷaṅkaḷum porukarit taraṅkamun tantiravāriyu
muṭaittāy vantu vaṭakaṭal teṉkaṭal paṭarvatupolat taṉperuñceṉai yevip pañcavaraiva
rum poruta porkkaḷat tañci veruneḷit toṭi yaraṇenap pukka kāṭaṟat tuṭai ttu nāṭṭip
paṭuttu maṟṟavartammai vaṉacararākki pocca veñcura meṟṟik koṟṟavil vijaiya
stampan ticaitoṟum niṟutti muttiṉ calāpamum muttamiṭpotiyamu mattaveṅkaripaṭu mayyaṟ
ccayyamuṅ kaṉniyuṅ kaikkoṇṭaruḷit teṉnāṭṭellai kāṭṭi kaṭamalaināṭṭetirn
ta cāveṟellā n=tani vicumpeṟa māveṟiya taṉvarutanit talaivaraik kuṟukalar kulaiyak koṭṭā
ṟuṭpaṭa neṟitaoṟum nilaikaḷiṭṭaruḷit tiṟalkoḷāramun tiruppuyat talaṅkaḷum pola viramun
tiyākamum viḷaṅkap pārmicai mevalar vaṇaṅka virasiṁhāsaṉattu Avanimuḻutu
ṭaiyāḷoṭum maṉniviṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakecaripanmarāṉa tripuvaṉa
ccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu 4 10 2Āvatu virutarāyapuya
ṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkānāṭṭu vāṉavaṉmātevipurattu ṉakarattom nilavilaiĀvaṇa
m Eṅkaḷur tirumāṇikuḻi mahādevark=ku nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu mānakāntalukku kiḻakku
keṭilattu nīroṭukālukku teṟkum pirekat tellaikku meṟkum Arumpontaikā
lukku vaṭakkum kiḻai nāṭukāṇi malaikku vaṭakku koyilum maṭaiviḷākamum nikki na
ṭuvuṭpaṭṭa nilam paṭṭaṇavantamum nirnilamuṅ kollainilamum Ittevarkku vi
ṟṟukkuṭuttuk koḷvatāna Emmi licainta vilaipporuḷ Aṉṟāṭu naṟkācu
10 1 yikkācu patinoṉṟum Āvaṇakkaḷiye kiḻikaic caelavaṟak koṇṭu vi
ṟṟukkuṭuttom Innilam kaikkoṇṭu tān veṇṭum payirceytu Ā
ḷuṭaiyare Aka ka Āṇṭācaṟutiyāka Aṉtarāyam Utaviṉāyakan tac
cukālāley kaṭamaic celavu peṟa Āṭṭu 100 5 10tinkala
nellu Aḷakkakkaṭavatākavum yinnilañ cuṭṭi vanta Eri
vāy pāṭikāval veṭṭimuṭṭaiyāḷ paṭṭiṟai cilliṟai Ec
coṟṟumāṭu Uṭpaṭṭa maṟṟepperpaṭṭa kaṭamaikaḷum nāṅkaḷe
Iṟuttu Iṉnellu nūṟṟaimpatiṉkalamey koḷḷakkaṭavo
mākavum yinnilattukku munpu nirpāyuṅ kālāley nir pāyappeṟu
vatākavum yipparicu yicaintu Orukkālāvatum yirukālāvatum
mukkālāvatum yikkācu patinoṉṟuṅ koṇṭu vilaikkaṟa viṟ
ṟup poruḷaṟak koṇṭu yittevarkku yinnilam viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇa
ñ ceytukuṭuttom vāṉavaṉmātevipurattu ṉakarattom
yinnilattukku yituvey poruḷmāvaṟutiyāvatākavum yituva
llatu veṟu poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭcelavolai
kāṭṭakkaṭavatallātutāka Ippiramāṇattil pe
cina kaṭamai Allatu Eṟṟam collom tiruvā
ṇai Avanimuḻutuṭaiyārāṇai tiruviraiyākkaliye
Ippaṭikkuk kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭi
kkoḷvateṉṟu Ipparicu Icaintu I
ppiramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom Iv
vāṉavaṉmātevipurattu ṉakarattom nakara
m paṇikka Eḻutineṉ mattiyattan viṭuruṭai
yān viṭurnātaneṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai
veḷiyūruṭaiyān periyān Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai
kulottuṅkacoḻakkāraikkāṭuṭaiyān Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai vaṭaiceriuṭaiyān pattaṇan
Uyyān Eḻuttu Ip
